title: Ancient Chinese Wu Opera dazzles Phnom Penh audience in cultural exchange
description: The iconic Chaktomuk Theatre in the Cambodian capital came alive on Friday evening as its grand hall brimmed with dazzling lights, music, and applause during a performance of Wu Opera, a centuries-old art form from East China's Zhejiang Province.The post Ancient Chinese Wu Opera dazzles Phnom Penh audience in cultural exchange appeared first on Khmer Times.

title: Ancient Plankton Reveal a Surprise About Future Ocean Oxygen
description: A new study suggests that some of the world’s oxygen-deprived oceans could eventually regain higher oxygen levels in the centuries ahead, even as the planet continues to warm. About 16 million years ago, the Arabian Sea contained more oxygen than it does today, even though Earth’s climate was warmer at the time. Strong monsoons, shifting [...]
